text: The only thing I will note right now, which I have mentioned before, is that the setup process for something simple like a Held-Suarez Model seems to be pretty complicated.  But I also have talked to <@UEN48T0BT> about this before and this could become easier in the future.  I mean tbf ClimateMachine is only at like v0.1 right now so the frontend isn’t really the priority right now?

text: Yeah, there are a lot of knobs available. I think the next iteration of some of our abstraction layers will simplify some of the specification of experiments. But as you said, we're still in v0.1.
